references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This work is highly relevant due to its significant advancement of latent video diffusion models, which are a core technology utilized in the proposed VidCRAFT3 framework.
This work demonstrates a significant advancement in real-time 3D-aware video relighting, which is relevant to the lighting control module of VidCRAFT3.
